Dark_Embrace.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast
Dark_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} protects you from lethal, smashing, toxic and negative energy damage.

Death_Shroud.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Death Shroud.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Defracting_cloud.display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
Defracting_cloud.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)
Defracting_cloud.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from fire, cold, energy and negative energy damage with your {PowerName}.

Obsidian_Shield.display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
Obsidian_Shield.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)
Obsidian_Shield.display_attacker_hit: You protect yourself from Psionic damage, Sleep, Fear and Disorient with your {PowerName}.

Dark_Regeneration.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Cloak_of_Darkness.display_help: A shroud of Netherworld darkness envelops you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Cloak of Darkness grants you a bonus to Defense to all attacks and some protection from Immobilization. This Netherworld Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Cloak of Darkness has no movement penalty. Cloak of Darkness will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow

Cloak_of_Fear.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, at a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast
Cloak_of_Fear.display_target_help: The Cloak of Fear has terrified you.

Oppressive_Gloom.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Special damage.

Soul_Transfer.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
Your {PowerName} steals {Damage} hit points and brings you back from the brink of death!
